00026 class FMKWayGainMgr2
00027 {
00028   typedef GNode Vertex;
00029   typedef GBPQueue<Vertex>         VertexPQ;
00030   typedef GBPQueueCursor<Vertex>   VertexPQCur;
00031 
00032   static const unsigned int _M = 64;  
00034 public:
00036   FMKWayGainMgr2(const FMParam& param);
00037 
00039   void init(const std::vector<unsigned char>& part, std::vector<short>* gain);
00040 
00041 
00044   Vertex* select(FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00045                  const std::vector<unsigned char>& part,
00046                  KWayConstrMgr3& constrMgr);
00047 
00049   int getGain(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo) const
00050   {
00051     const unsigned int toPart = moveInfo._toPart;
00052     return _gainBucket[toPart].getKey(_vertexArray[toPart][moveInfo._i_v]);
00053   }
00054 
00055 
00058   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00059                   const short* = 0)      
00060   {
00061     const unsigned int fromPart = moveInfo._fromPart;
00062     const unsigned int i_v = moveInfo._i_v;
00063     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); k++) {
00064       if (fromPart == k) continue;
00065       _gainBucket[k].detach(_vertexArray[k][i_v]);
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069 
00071   void updateNeighbor(unsigned int whichPart,  
00072                       unsigned int i_w,    
00073                       const short* deltaGain)  
00074   {
00075     if (_cellList[i_w].isLocked()) return;
00076     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); k++) {
00077       if (k == whichPart) continue;
00078       _gainBucket[k].modifyKeyLIFOBy(_vertexArray[k][i_w], deltaGain[k]);
00079     }
00080   }
00081 
00082 
00084   void pushBack(unsigned int whichPart, unsigned int i_w, const short* gain)
00085   {
00086     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); k++) {
00087       if (whichPart == k) continue;
00088       _gainBucket[k].pushBack(_vertexArray[k][i_w], gain[k]);
00089     }
00090   }
00091 
00092   
00094   void updateGain(const std::vector<unsigned char>& part, 
00095                   std::vector<short>* gain
00096                   )
00097   {
00098     init(part, gain);
00099   }
00100 
00101 
00102 protected:
00104   unsigned int getNumPartitions() const { return _K; }
00105 
00106 protected:
00107   Netlist&       _H;                    
00108   unsigned int   _K;                    
00109   VertexPQ       _gainBucket[_M];       
00110   VertexPQCur    _gainBucketCur[_M];    
00111   std::vector<Vertex> _vertexArray[_M]; 
00112   Cell* const    _cellList;             
00113 };
